content:
{"name": "CHEER (Community Health and Empowerment through Education and Research) ", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* **Currently not accepting new clients**
* Participants need to register providing general information (name, address, phone number, #people in the family (#adults, #kids) and country of origin). 
* Open for registration to people who live in the following zip codes:
	* 20903
	* 20901
	* 20912
* Once registered, volunteers assigned their # in the list and communicate to them by text message.
* People are required to park nearby if they’re in cars because we distribute the food to walkers only (safety reasons).", "email": "", "url": "https://www.communitycheer.org/contact", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "8720 Carroll Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "New Hampshire Estates", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20903", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.998303, "longitude": -76.99229749999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(301) 589-3633", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "20:00", "closes_at": "21:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "20:00", "closes_at": "21:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Not accepting new clients"}]}
